data.text: @artisteformerly @Cherrykickstart After seeing tankies romanticize and lionize Milosevic and his Serb death squads, I'd never thought I'd see tankies cross into COVID truthism but here we are.

@artisteformerly @lunanuovarossa @sovietkuromi Also Russia is a large nation with a sophisticated intellegence department and is currently at war. The west is obviously running disinfo campaigns right now, and while they certainly aren't equal it would be foolish to pretend that Russia isn't running disinfo as well.

@artisteformerly @lunanuovarossa @sovietkuromi The US does have a massive pharmaceutical industry and I imagine funding for mRNA vaccine research was probably increased a thousandfold when the pandemic hit, and international collaborative research is very common. I think this is rushing into conspiracy a bit quickly.
@artisteformerly i had my suspicions that they decided to release covid19 via community spread once they saw Bernie winning the primaries yes i'm sticking with that logic
@ainiladra @truthaddictVT I absolutely hate to see it
@ainiladra @truthaddictVT Smh dang, what a good point
@artisteformerly @truthaddictVT have felt this since the beginning tbh https://t.co/KRLOqwca5c

@artisteformerly Iâ€™ve had my suspicions about COVID having a more western origin but never felt comfortable stating it openly. I do think a few decades from now that hypothesis is not going to be able to be dismissed.
